name: Tachytelic Metamorphosis
text:
Target a friendly squad.

Affected models gain +2 RAT, +2 MAT, and +2 DEF. Models affected by this Cypher cannot be targeted by Cyphers of the same type.

Tachytelic Metamorphosis expires at the end of the Pulse round.
changes: Added "Models affected by this Cypher cannot be targeted by Cyphers of the same type." restriction.
